vulnerability_findings.name: array-length-outside-loop
vulnerability_findings.message: Caching the array length outside a loop saves reading it on each iteration, as long as the array's length is not changed during the loop.

vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
BlockRewardAuRa._distributeRewards (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#954-1138) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- block.number == _rewardPointBlock - 1
	- block.number == _rewardPointBlock

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in BlockRewardAuRa._distributeRewards (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#954-1138):
	External calls:
	- validators = _validatorSetContract.getValidators() (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#972)
	- totalReward += _stakingContract.stakingEpochDuration() * 1000000000000000000 (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#1035)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- uintStorage (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#1039)
	- uintStorage (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#1043-1047)
	- uintStorage (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#1044-1046)
	- uintStorage (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#1050)
	- uintStorage (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#1055)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in BlockRewardAuRa._distributeRewards (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#954-1138):
	External calls:
	- IERC20Minting(_erc20TokenContract).mintReward(receivers,rewards) (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#1116)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- uintStorage (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#1117)
	- uintStorage (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#1132)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in BlockRewardBase.migrateMintingStatistics (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#271-279):
	External calls:
	- prevMinted = _prevBlockRewardContract.mintedTotally() (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#273)
	- prevMintedByBridge = _prevBlockRewardContract.mintedTotallyByBridge(_bridge) (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#274)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- uintStorage (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#277)
	- uintStorage (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#278)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in BlockRewardAuRa.reward (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#763-872):
	External calls:
	- ! validatorSet.isValidator(benefactors[0]) (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#775-777)
	- IRandomAuRa(validatorSet.randomContract()).onFinishCollectRound() (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#784)
	- stakingContract = IStaking(validatorSet.stakingContract()) (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#798)
	- stakingEpoch = stakingContract.stakingEpoch() (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#800)
	- rewardPointBlock = _rewardPointBlock(IStakingAuRa(address(stakingContract)),validatorSet) (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#801)
	- validatorSet.validatorSetApplyBlock() != 0 && block.number <= rewardPointBlock (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#803-809)
	- (newStakingEpochHasBegun,poolsToBeElectedLength) = validatorSet.newValidatorSet() (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#812)
	- newValidatorSet = validatorSet.getPendingValidators() (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#817)
	- stakingAddress = validatorSet.stakingByMiningAddress(newValidatorSet[i]) (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#820)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- addressArrayStorage (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#824)
	- addressStorage (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#822)
	- boolStorage (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#830)
	- uintArrayStorage (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#825)
	- uintStorage (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#822)
	- uintStorage (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#829)

	- IRandomAuRa(validatorSet.randomContract()).onFinishCollectRound() (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#784)
	- stakingContract = IStaking(validatorSet.stakingContract()) (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#798)
	- stakingEpoch = stakingContract.stakingEpoch() (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#800)
	- rewardPointBlock = _rewardPointBlock(IStakingAuRa(address(stakingContract)),validatorSet) (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#801)
	- validatorSet.validatorSetApplyBlock() != 0 && block.number <= rewardPointBlock (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#803-809)
	- (newStakingEpochHasBegun,poolsToBeElectedLength) = validatorSet.newValidatorSet() (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#812)
	- newValidatorSet = validatorSet.getPendingValidators() (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#817)
	- stakingAddress = validatorSet.stakingByMiningAddress(newValidatorSet[i]) (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#820)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- addressArrayStorage (BlockRewardAuRa.sol#828)
